Output MLB Team Abbreviations

Source: R/load_data.R
load_headshots.Rd

Output MLB Team Abbreviations

Usage

load_headshots()

Value

A tibble of player names and ids from various sources.

Examples

# \donttest{
load_headshots()
#>          player_name      last_first      chadwick_name      espn_name
#>               <char>          <char>             <char>         <char>
#>    1:     Luis Ortiz     Ortiz, Luis         Luis Ortiz     Luis Ortiz
#>    2: Alex Rodriguez Rodriguez, Alex     Alex Rodriguez Alex Rodriguez
#>    3: LaTroy Hawkins Hawkins, LaTroy     LaTroy Hawkins LaTroy Hawkins
#>    4:     Joe Hudson     Hudson, Joe         Joe Hudson     Joe Hudson
#>    5:  Bartolo Colon  Colon, Bartolo      Bartolo Colon  Bartolo Colon
#>   ---                                                                 
#> 3583:           <NA>            <NA>        Oliver Dunn           <NA>
#> 3584:           <NA>            <NA>   Tyler Fitzgerald           <NA>
#> 3585:           <NA>            <NA> Spencer Arrighetti           <NA>
#> 3586:           <NA>            <NA>       Noelvi Marte           <NA>
#> 3587:           <NA>            <NA>        Jared Jones           <NA>
#>       savant_id  bbref_id retro_id fangraphs_id espn_id
#>           <num>    <char>   <char>        <num>   <num>
#>    1:    656814 ortizlu02 ortil002        16942    2966
#>    2:    121347 rodrial01 rodra001         1274    3115
#>    3:    115629 hawkila01 hawkl001          729    3176
#>    4:    621529 hudsojo03 hudsj002        14412    3258
#>    5:    112526 colonba01 colob001          375    3602
#>   ---                                                  
#> 3583:    686554  dunnol01 dunno001           NA      NA
#> 3584:    666149 fitzgty01 fitzt001        26208      NA
#> 3585:    681293 arrigsp01     <NA>           NA      NA
#> 3586:    682622 marteno01 martn004        26517      NA
#> 3587:    683003 jonesja09 jonej008           NA      NA
#>                                                                     espn_headshot
#>                                                                            <char>
#>    1: https://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/headshots/mlb/players/full/2966.png
#>    2: https://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/headshots/mlb/players/full/3115.png
#>    3: https://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/headshots/mlb/players/full/3176.png
#>    4: https://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/headshots/mlb/players/full/3258.png
